pages.title: Crafting Tablet
pages.text: The Crafting Tablet is so much more than a portable Crafting Table. It saves a recipe you inserted and lets you craft it on demand.

pages.title: Pedestal Automation
pages.text: There may come a time when you feel you need a certain material so often that you want to automate it. Or you're one of those masochists who automate every single item because they can.$(br2)The $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestal$() has a dedicated slot for a Crafting Tablet. When you add items with hoppers or similar to the pedestal, they will be placed appropriately and evenly, like specified in the saved recipe.
